d.f: ￹￺a grammatical particle similar to the force of saan but with the force of a substantive￻文法上的特別用詞，與 saan 相似不過是靠實質力量
￹￺a summary of what a person thought or said￻簡述某人的意思或說過的話

e: ￹`Ma~`toka~ `kako~ `o~ `sanay~ `nira~.￺He is saying he is lazy.￻他是在說，他很懶惰
d.f: ￹￺a descriptive of what the character of something is￻描述某事物的特質
